Header.description: Searchbar, Darkmode, Wallet, Noticification and profile

Sidebar.description: Title and List items in the conatiner

chart-one.description: it is doghnut chart showing stattistics

CounterSection.location: Top of the page of main section taking 100% width
CounterSection.description: Displays a counter section with dynamic counting functionality of artworks, auction, creators and canceled

OverviewSection.location: below countersection component of main section taking 100% width
OverviewSection.description: Includes information like the item's title, ID, current bid amount, remaining time for bidding, user details, and options for adding to favorites or placing a bid.

AllBidsSection.location: Mid of the page above updatetable component of main section taking 100% width
AllBidsSection.description: Displays all bids with associated product cards, enabling users to view artwork and bid on items

allbids-card.location: In the AllBidsSection aligned using grid
allbids-card.description: Displays product cards, enabling users to view artwork and bid on items

UpdateTable.location: Bottom of the page of main section taking 100% width
UpdateTable.description: Table for displaying NFT updates with filter options.

functionality.sidebar_toogle: a feature that allows the sidebar to be hide
functionality.table_filtering: a feature that allows the table to be filtered
